import React from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useAuth } from "../../contexts/AuthContext"; import { Button } from "./button"; import { Badge } from "./badge"; import { toast } from "./use-toast"; export function HeroSection() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const { user } = useAuth(); const { toast } = useToast(); const handleAuthAction = (action) => { if (!user) { toast({ title: "Please Sign In", description: "You need to sign in to access this feature.", variant: "destructive", }); navigate("/login"); return; } action(); }; return (
